page.title: 09Housing in Sigglesthorne
page.content: There are about{137}houses in Sigglesthorne and about{42}houses in Catwick. Most of the houses are made from{bricks}because there is no local stone suitable for building. Most houses have a bathroom, kitchen, dining room, a living room and bedrooms. Most of the houses in Sigglesthorne are{semi-detached. Some houses in Sigglesthorne have {modern appliances}like microwave ovens, computers, video, remote controlled televisions and stereos. Some of the houses in Sigglesthorne have{garages}in which they keep their cars and tools. Some people also have garden{sheds}and {greenhouses. Everybody is connected to mains {water}and to the{sewerage}system. All houses have mains{electricity}but there is no{mains gas}supply.
